entries.s_a65f8ef3: As a crafter, I'm going to vote for the Director of Commerce, Sean Trenwell. I definitely need more business and, with his influence, more merchants will be brought in, naturally bringing out more buyers. I really think you should vote. Talk with the governor at the capitol for more information regarding the election.
entries.s_a3f92c54: I've heard that Sean Trenwell funded the establishment of the new market place with his own fortune. Maybe you should check the new market place out. I hear the merchants there are searching for rare objects... coins, bones or something like that.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (bestine_rumor05.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
